# re2r Benchmark

+ TRE - TRE in R base
+ PRCE - Perl Compatible Regular Expressions in R base
+ ICU - ICU with stringi
+ RE2n - RE2 with string pattern
+ RE2c - RE2 with pre-compiled regular expression

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
src <- if (Sys.getenv("OS") == "Linux" && # for travis
           Sys.getenv("RUN_RE2R_BENCHMARK") == "TRUE") {
    knit_expand(file = "./disabled/benchmark.Rmd")
} else {
    knit_expand(file = "./disabled/blank.Rmd")
}
```

`r knit(text = src)`
